subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Israeli-born forward Omri Casspi, a first-round draft pick of the Kings in 2009 who is in his second season with the Cavaliers, has seen his fortunes improve in the N.B.A., although his team’s have not.
snippet: The Israeli-born forward Omri Casspi, a first-round draft pick of the Kings in 2009 who is in his second season with the Cavaliers, has seen his fortunes improve in the N.B.A., although his team’s have not.
